thread.title: Adele's new single 'Hello' is bringing Twitter to tears

author: chron.com
title: Adele's new single 'Hello' is bringing Twitter to tears
text:
Photo: Associated Press Image 1 of / 20 20 The British ballad singer's first new music video in three years, "Hello" has made a huge impact on social media - but mainly on all of our hearts.
Keep clicking through to see the best reactions from social media on Adele's new single "Hello." The British ballad singer's first new music video in three years, "Hello" has made a huge impact on social media - but mainly on all of our hearts.
Keep clicking through to see the best reactions from social ... more Image 2 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 3 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 4 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 5 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 6 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 7 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 8 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 9 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 10 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 11 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 12 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 13 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 14 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 15 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 16 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 17 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 18 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 19 of 20 Source: Twitter Source: Twitter Photo: Twitter Image 20 of 20 Adele's new single 'Hello' is bringing Twitter to tears 1 / 20 Back to Gallery Adele has returned!
The British ballad singer's first new music video in three years, "Hello" has made a huge impact on social media - and especially on all of our hearts.
This is the first track off of her upcoming album, 25, and it is the sweeping Adele breakup ballad that's heart-wrenching, beautiful and sure to touch the soul of whoever has said goodbye to a lost love. The full album is expected to be released on November 20.
The video does feature awkward calls made on flip phones, and the outdated technology seemed to bother some fans. But Adele's eyes are so captivating with her wing-tipped eyeliner, that that is easily looked over.
Twitter instantly began to buzz Friday morning with all of the terrific love notes to Adele. She left us longing for more.
Click through the gallery above to see the best Tweets from Friday's Adele love-fest.
